Configuration and log file

How did you install BIRT, thru update manager or download framework directly?

Which version BIRT did you install?

I tried Europa update site (installed BIRT and it's dependency only) on Linux AS3 just now. It works fine and I can not reproduce the error  you mentioned. The vm I used is 1.5.0.
I am using VM1.5 also, but I use an other Linux: I use Debian (and I know that that is not one of the supported Linux's).
Debian is not a supported os. Do we need to test with it and fix such bugs?

As a software developer myself my answer is simple: if it not on the to-be-supported-os-list I would not fix it unless it was trivial. The fact that it is not reproducible means that it is not trivial. I loose ;-)
please try build on Debian Linux in 2.2.1
Joost, what's the version of Debian are you using?

The holidays agreed with my computer, Debian and Eclipse (I am rested too):
(Re)installing a fresh Eclipse (GA this time) with all my desired plugins made the exceptions go away. 

Thanks for looking into the problem
